snippet: A deal reached with the United Nations’ nuclear watchdog called for additional inspections of known nuclear sites and more information about uranium mines and other facilities.
abstract: Iranian government commits to providing information on detonators for the first time as part of series of confidence-building measures with International Atomic Energy Agency; measures include additional inspections and clarifications on questions that IAEA had asked Iran for years.
lead_paragraph: A deal reached with the United Nations’ nuclear watchdog called for additional inspections of known nuclear sites and more information about uranium mines and other facilities.

headline.main: Iran Agrees to Provide Data on Its Detonators
headline.print_headline: Iran Agrees to Provide Data on Its Detonators
